content.title: RHSA-2022:7268: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 13.0 (openvswitch2.11) security update (Important)
content.description:
Security Fix(es):

* DoS when a Vhost header crosses more than two descriptors and exhausts all mbufs (CVE-2022-2132)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page listed in the References section.
